TextView.android:text: Aiming to bring world-class infrastructure to the city of Lucknow, the Hon'ble Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh announced the Lucknow Metro Rail Project in his Budget speech for the year 2013-14. The project will provide the inhabitants and visitors to Lucknow a world-class Mass Rapid Transit System that is convenient, safe, fast, reliable and cost-effective. For seamless implementation of the Project, a SPV in the form of a company known as Lucknow Metro Rail Corporation Limited has been incorporated by the Government of Uttar Pradesh.
